      • supportOption

        public static boolean supportOption(javax.jcr.Node node,
                    String option)
                             throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
        The repository's support option definition.
        Parameters:
        node - JCR node
        option - requested repository's option
        Returns:
        true if repository supports option, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        javax.jcr.RepositoryException - thrown when any error with repository was occurred.
